job_description: You will be helping build people's dreams. This is exactly what we do at Two Tall Totems. Clients come to us with an amazing vision of a product / game / app and we help them realize this. Work with some of the best mobile developers in Vancouver and hone your programming skills.  We focuss solely on mobile development and the backend that powers such apps. We create apps for clients and are developing some very interesting in house apps that are unique enough to require filed patents (pending). Come make a difference with us and be part of the Two Tall Totems Team.
job_requirements: Mobile developer required for a fun company with very unique projects.Prefer those with some experience programming in Obj C or Swift using xcode.Open To All Majors:No
